amount.description: This is the Amount of money you wish to transfer. This amount shall always be less than the total value in your Balance

customer_identifier.description: This is the Customer Identifier number for sub-wallet.

currency.description: This is the currency of the payouts you are making. At the moment, Niobi Payments supports KES transactions only

payment_reference.description: This is the account number associated with Niobi, that holds the value from which a pyaout is being made

first_name.description: This is the first name of the Payee who is being paid out

last_name.description: This is the last name of the Payee who is being paid out

mobile.description: This is the mobile number of the Payee who is being paid out. Use the correct formatting as described in the example

email.description: This is the email  of the Payee who is being paid out

country.description: This is the country of the Payee who is being paid out

city.description: This is the city of the Payee who is being paid out

postal_code.description: This is the postal code of the Payee who is being paid out

line1.description: This is the street address of the Payee who is being paid out

client_callback_url.description: You can provide call back URL to get payment confirmation response.

payment_method_type.description: This is the preferred payment method you want to use to payout the money and what makes the Niobi Payment API really unique as we support all popular mobile money and bank payments

sendmoney.description: Using M-Pesa Send Money method needs a recipient's phone number

phone_number.description: Enter the recipient's mobile number. Be sure to use the right fomatting

paybill.description: Using M-Pesa PayBill method needs A Paybill Number and Account Number

tillnumber.description: Using M-Pesa till number method needs the recipient's Till Number

pesalink.description: Niobi Payments also allows payouts via Bank Transfers using Pesalink. This transfer needs the following information

account_number.description: This is the account number associated with the recipient that will receive the payout

mobile.description: This is the mobile number of the Payee who is being paid out. Use the correct formatting as described in the example
